file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: DaTeam API Server
  description: DaTeam SDC service provides an interface to SDC Forms and their Responses
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:3001/api/v1
    description: Local Dev
  - url: https://dateam-frontend.herokuapp.com/api/v1
    description: Production
tags:
  - name: patient
    description: Access to patient information
  - name: procedure
    description: Access to medical procedure information
  - name: form
    description: Operations on SDC Forms
  - name: response
    description: Operations on SDC Form responses
  - name: parser
    description: XML parser for SDC Form
externalDocs:
  description: "Find out more about our project"
  url: "https://umar-ahmed.gitbook.io/project-dateam/"
paths:
  /patients:
    post:
      description: "Create a new patient"
      tags:
        - patient
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: SDC Patient
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/PatientRequestBody"
      responses:
        201:
          description: "Patient created successfully, return UID"
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UID"
    get:
      description: "Get all patients"
      tags:
        - patient
      responses:
        200:
          description: Return all patients
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Patient"

  /patients/{patientId}:
    get:
      description: "Get a specific patient"
      tags:
        - patient
      parameters:
        - name: patientId
          description: "UID of patient (not the OHIP number)"
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Return the specified patient"
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Patient"
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
    put:
      description: Update a patient
      tags:
        - patient
      parameters:
        - name: patientId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: SDC Patient
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/PatientRequestBody"
      responses:
        204:
          description: Patient updated successfully
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"

  /patients/search:
    post:
      description: "Search for patients"
      tags:
        - patient
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: Query Object
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/QueryObject"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Patients matching the search condition
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Patient"
        400:
          description: Query object is invalid
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"

  /procedures:
    post:
      description: "Create a new procedure"
      tags:
        - procedure
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: SDC procedure
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProcedureRequestBody"
      responses:
        201:
          description: "Procedure created successfully, return UID"
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UID"
    get:
      description: "Get all procedures"
      tags:
        - procedure
      responses:
        200:
          description: Return all procedures
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Procedure"

  /procedures/{procedureId}:
    get:
      description: Get a specific procedure
      tags:
        - procedure
      parameters:
        - name: procedureId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Returns the requested procedure
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Procedure"
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
    put:
      description: Update a procedure
      tags:
        - procedure
      parameters:
        - name: procedureId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: SDC procedure
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProcedureRequestBody"
      responses:
        204:
          description: Procedure updated successfully
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"

  /procedures/search:
    post:
      description: "Search for procedures"
      tags:
        - procedure
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: Query Object
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/QueryObject"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Procedures matching the search condition
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Procedure"
        400:
          description: Query object is invalid
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"

  /parser:
    post:
      tags:
        - parser
      description: Parses an SDC XML file into JSON
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: SDC XML file
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/SDCXML"
            examples:
              lung:
                $ref: "#/components/examples/lung"
              stroke:
                $ref: "#/components/examples/stroke"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successfully parsed XML
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormRequestBody"
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"

  /forms:
    get:
      tags:
        - form
      description: Get information about all forms
      responses:
        200:
          description: Forms fetched successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormPartial"
    post:
      tags:
        - form
      description: Create a new form
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormRequestBody"
      responses:
        201:
          description: Successfully created form, return UID
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UID"
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"

  /forms/{formId}:
    get:
      description: Get a specific form
      tags:
        - form
      parameters:
        - name: formId
          description: "UID of form"
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Return patients matching query"
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Form"
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"

  /forms/{formId}/responses:
    get:
      description: Get responses for a form
      tags:
        - response
      parameters:
        - name: formId
          description: "UID of form"
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Returns array of responses
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormResponsePartial"
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"

  /forms/search:
    post:
      description: "Search for forms"
      tags:
        - form
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: Query Object
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/QueryObject"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Partial forms matching the search condition
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormPartial"
        400:
          description: Query object is invalid
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"

  /responses:
    post:
      description: Create a new response
      tags:
        - response
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormResponseRequestBody"
      responses:
        201:
          description: Response created successfully, return UID
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UID"
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"

  /responses/{responseId}:
    get:
      description: Get a specific form response
      tags:
        - response
      parameters:
        - name: responseId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Returns the requested response
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormResponse"
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
    put:
      description: Update a response
      tags:
        - response
      parameters:
        - name: responseId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormResponseRequestBody"
      responses:
        204:
          description: Response updated successfully
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"
    delete:
      description: Delete a response
      tags:
        - response
      parameters:
        - name: responseId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        204:
          description: Response updated successfully
        400:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
        404:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotFound"

  /responses/search:
    post:
      description: "Search for responses"
      tags:
        - response
      requestBody:
        required: true
        description: Query Object
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/QueryObject"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Partial formResponse matching the search condition
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormResponse"
        400:
          description: Query object is invalid
          $ref: "#/components/responses/BadRequest"

components:
  responses:
    UID:
      description: Unique Identifier
      content:
        text/plain:
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 5d5bb199-59e2-400e-9f16-2d1d4d0db106
    NotFound:
      description: The specified resource was not found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    BadRequest:
      description: BadRequest
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
  schemas:
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
      required:
        - code
        - message

    QueryObject:
      type: object
      properties:
        __class:
          type: string
          description: Class identifier
          default: Query
        targetClass:
          type: string
          description: The class this query is for
          example: "SDCForm"
        condition:
          type: object
          description: Query condition
          example:
            __class: ColumnCondition
            opt: contains
            column: id
            value: '111'

    Patient:
      type: object
      properties:
        uid:
          type: string
          description: Unique identifier for this patient
          format: uuid
        id:
          type: string
          description: External ID (typically OHIP) for identifying the patient
          example: "5584-486-674-YM"
        name:
          type: string
          description: The legal name of the patient
          example: "Jane Doe"

    PatientRequestBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        __class:
          type: string
          description: Class identifier
          default: Patient
        id:
          type: string
          description: External ID (typically OHIP) for identifying the patient
          example: "5584-486-674-YM"
        name:
          type: string
          description: The legal name of the patient
          example: "Jane Doe"

    Procedure:
      type: object
      properties:
        uid:
          type: string
          description: Unique identifier for this procedure
          format: uuid
        id:
          type: string
          description: External ID (DiagnosticProcedureID in handout) for identifying the procedure
        name:
          type: string
          description: The name of the procedure
          example: "Lung Biopsy"

    ProcedureRequestBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        __class:
          type: string
          description: Class identifier
          default: Procedure
        id:
          type: string
          description: Diagnostic procedure ID
        name:
          type: string
          description: The name of the diagnostic procedure
          example: "CT Scan"

    FormPartial:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          description: Unique identifier of this form
          example: "covid-19-test-55728d"
        uid:
          type: string
          description: Unique identifier of this form
          format: uuid
        title:
          type: string
          description: The title of the form
          example: "Lung Biopsy Analysis"

    FormRequestBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        __class:
          type: string
          description: Class identifier
          default: "SDCForm"
        id:
          type: string
          description: Unique identifier of this form
          example: "covid-19-test-55728d"
        title:
          type: string
          description: The title of the form
          example: "Lung Biopsy Analysis"
        lineage:
          type: string
          description: The lineage of the form
          example: Covid-19-test
        version:
          type: string
          description: The version of the form
          example: 55728d
        order:
          type: number
          description: Order of this item in form
        formProperties:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
          example: []
        children:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
          example: []

    Form:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormRequestBody"
        - type: object
          properties:
            uid:
              type: string
              description: Unique identifier of this form
              format: uuid

    FormResponsePartial:
      type: object
      properties:
        form_id:
          type: string
          description: ID of form
          format: uuid
        uid:
          type: string
          description: Unique identifier of this form response
          format: uuid
        patient_id:
          type: string
          description: Unique identifier of the patient whom the response is for
          format: uuid

    FormResponseRequestBody:
      type: object
      properties:
        __class:
          description: Class identifier
          type: string
          default: "SDCFormResponse"
        formId:
          type: string
          description: ID of form
          format: uuid
        patientID:
          type: string
          description: ID of patient
          format: uuid
        answers:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              __class:
                description: Class identifier
                type: string
                default: "SDCAnswer"
              questionID:
                type: string
                description: ID of question
              responses:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: string

    FormResponse:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/FormResponsePartial"
        - type: object
          properties:
            answers:
              type: array
              items:
                type: object
                properties:
                  question_id:
                    type: string
                    description: ID of question
                  responses:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string

    SDCJSON:
      type: object
      properties:
        __class:
          description: Class identifier
          type: string
          default: "SDCForm"
        id:
          type: string
          description: Unique identifier of this form
          example: "covid-19-test-55728d"
        title:
          type: string
          description: The title of the form
          example: "Lung Biopsy Analysis"
        order:
          type: number
          description: Order of this item in form

    SDCXML:
      type: object
      properties:
        XMLPackage:
          type: object
          properties:
            FormDesign:
              type: object
              properties:
                Property:
                  type: object
                Body:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    ChildItems:
                      type: object
                Footer:
                  type: object
      xml:
        name: "SDCPackage"
  examples:
    lung:
      summary: LDCT Lung Screening
      value: |
        <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
        <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="sdctemplate.xslt"?>
        <SDCPackage xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:ihe:qrph:sdc:2016" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:ihe:qrph:sdc:2016 ../Schemas/RFD+SDCRetrieveForm.xsd" packageID="PKG_LDCT_Lung" version="1.0.0" lineage="LDCTLung" fullURI="_baseURI=www.cancercare.on.ca/LDCTlung/SDC/IHE/&_lineage=LDCTLung&_version=1.0.0&_docType=sdcPKG">
          <XMLPackage>
            <FormDesign xmlns="urn:ihe:qrph:sdc:2016" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:ihe:qrph:sdc:2016 SDCFormDesign.xsd" ID="FORM_LDCT_Lung" formTitle="Lung Cancer Screening Template" baseURI="www.cancercare.on.ca/LDCTlung/SDC/IHE/" version="1.0.0" lineage="LDCTLung" fullURI="_baseURI=www.cancercare.on.ca/LDCTlung/SDC/IHE/&_lineage=LDCTLung&_version=1.0.0&_docType=sdcFDF">
              <Property type="meta" styleClass="copyright" order="1" propName="Copyright" val="(c) 2017 Cancer Care Ontario.  All rights reserved." />
              <Property propName="Approval" propClass="meta" order="2" styleClass="float-right" val="CCO Cancer Imaging Program approved" />
              <Property propName="GenericHeaderText" type="meta" styleClass="left" val="High Risk Lung Cancer Screening Summary (Checklist)" />
              <Property propName="OfficialName" propClass="meta" val="LDCT Lung Cancer Screening Reporting Template" />
              <Property propName="Category" propClass="meta" val="Thoracic" />
              <Property propName="Restrictions" propClass="meta" val="Protocol LDCT Lung Cancer Screening." />
              <Property propName="Required" propClass="meta" val="true" />
              <Property propName="CTV_Dkey" propClass="meta" val="" />
              <Property propName="ChecklistCKey" propClass="meta" val="" />
              <Property propName="VersionID" propClass="meta" val="1.1" />
              <Property propName="CurrentFileName" propClass="meta" val="LDCT Lung Screening Pilot ver 1.1" />
              <Property propName="ApprovalStatus" propClass="meta" val="0" />
              <Property propName="EffectiveDate" propClass="meta" val="2017-02-24" styleClass="right" />
              <Body title="LDCT Lung Screening Template" ID="root" styleClass="title">
                <Property propName="Publisher" propClass="Reporttext" val="Cancer Care Ontario" />
                <Property propName="Version" propClass="Reporttext" val="version 1.1" />
                <Property propName="ReleaseDate" propClass="Reporttext" val="2017-02-24" />
                <Contact>
                  <Organization>
                    <OrgName val="Cancer Care Ontario" />
                    <Email>
                      <EmailAddress val="alexander.goel@cancercare.on.ca" />
                    </Email>
                    <Email>
                      <EmailAddress val="david.kwan@cancercare.on.ca" />
                    </Email>
                  </Organization>
                </Contact>
                <ChildItems>
                  <Section title="CLINICAL INFORMATION" type="level1" ID="000001">
                    <CodedValue>
                      <Code val="55752-0" />
                      <CodeText val="Clinical Information" />
                      <CodeSystem>
                        <CodeSystemName val="LOINC" />
                      </CodeSystem>
                    </CodedValue>
                    <ChildItems>
                      <Question title="Clinical Information:" ID="000002">
                        <Property propClass="numbering" propName="numbering" val="1." />
                        <ResponseField>
                          <Response>
                            <string val="" />
                          </Response>
                        </ResponseField>
                      </Question>
                      <Question title="Reason for exam:" ID="000004">
                        <Property propClass="numbering" propName="numbering" val="2." />
                        <CodedValue>
                          <Code val="RID10393" />
                          <CodeText val="imaging purpose" />
                          <CodeSystem>
                            <CodeSystemName val="RADLEX" />
                          </CodeSystem>
                        </CodedValue>
                        <ListField>
                          <List>
                            <ListItem title="Baseline scan" ID="000005">
                              <CodedValue>
                                <Code val="RID49571" />
                                <CodeText val="Baseline" />
                                <CodeSystem>
                                  <CodeSystemName val="RADLEX" />
                                </CodeSystem>
                              </CodedValue>
                            </ListItem>
                            <ListItem title="12 month recall" ID="000006">
                              <CodedValue>
                                <Code val="RID50144" />
                                <CodeText val="12 month follow-up procedure" />
                                <CodeSystem>
                                  <CodeSystemName val="RADLEX" />
                                </CodeSystem>
                              </CodedValue>
                            </ListItem>
                            <ListItem title="6 month follow-up" ID="000007">
                              <CodedValue>
                                <Code val="RID50145" />
                                <CodeText val="6 month follow-Up" />
                                <CodeSystem>
                                  <CodeSystemName val="RADLEX" />
                                </CodeSystem>
                              </CodedValue>
                            </ListItem>
                            <ListItem title="3 month follow-up" ID="777777">
                              <CodedValue>
                                <Code val="RID50239" />
                                <CodeText val="3-month follow-up procedure" />
                                <CodeSystem>
                                  <CodeSystemName val="RADLEX" />
                                </CodeSystem>
                              </CodedValue>
                            </ListItem>
                            <ListItem title="Other follow-up" ID="000008">
                              <CodedValue>
                                <Code val="RID35965" />
                                <CodeText val="Follow-up procedure" />
                                <CodeSystem>
                                  <CodeSystemName val="RADLEX" />
                                </CodeSystem>
                              </CodedValue>
                            </ListItem>
                          </List>
                        </ListField>
                      </Question>
                    </ChildItems>
                  </Section>
                  <Section title="COMPARISON STUDIES" type="level1" ID="000010">
                    <CodedValue>
                      <Code val="18834-2" />
                      <CodeText val="Radiology Comparison study" />
                      <CodeSystem>
                        <CodeSystemName val="LOINC" />
                      </CodeSystem>
                    </CodedValue>
                    <ChildItems>
                      <Question title="Comparison Study:" ID="000011">
                        <Property propClass="numbering" propName="numbering" val="1." />
                        <ListField>
                          <List>
                            <ListItem title="None Available" ID="000012" />
                            <ListItem title="Previous CT Exam:" ID="000013">
                              <CodedValue>
                                <Code val="RID28454" />
                                <CodeText val="comparison image" />
                                <CodeSystem>
                                  <CodeSystemName val="RADLEX" />
                                </CodeSystem>
                              </CodedValue>
                              <ChildItems>
                                <Question ID="000014" maxCard="0">
                                  <ResponseField>
                                    <Response>
                                      <date xsi:nil="true" />
                                    </Response>
                                    <TextAfterResponse val="(dates)" />
                                  </ResponseField>
                                </Question>
                              </ChildItems>
                            </ListItem>
                          </List>
                        </ListField>
                      </Question>
                    </ChildItems>
                  </Section>
                  <Section title="IMAGING PROCEDURE DESCRIPTION" type="level1" ID="000016">
                    <CodedValue>
                      <Code val="55111-9" />
                      <CodeText val="Current imaging procedure descriptions" />
                      <CodeSystem>
                        <CodeSystemName val="LOINC" />
                      </CodeSystem>
                    </CodedValue>
                    <ChildItems>
                      <Question title="Overall Image Quality:" ID="000017">
                        <Property propClass="numbering" propName="numbering" val="1." />
                        <CodedValue>
                          <Code val="RID10" />
                          <CodeText val="image quality" />
                          <CodeSystem>
                            <CodeSystemName val="RADLEX" />
                          </CodeSystem>
                        </CodedValue>
                        <ListField numCols="3">
                          <DefaultCodeSystem>
                            <CodeSystemName val="RADLEX" />
                            <OID val="2.16.840.1.113883.6.256" />
                          </DefaultCodeSystem>
                          <List>
                            <ListItem title="Adequate" ID="000018">
                              <CodedValue>
                                <Code val="RID11" />
                                <CodeText val="exemplary quality" />
                              </CodedValue>
                            </ListItem>
                            <ListItem title="Suboptimal" ID="000019">
                              <CodedValue>
                                <Code val="RID13" />
                                <CodeText val="limited quality" />
                              </CodedValue>
                            </ListItem>
                            <ListItem title="Non-diagnostic" ID="000020">
                              <CodedValue>
                                <Code val="RID14" />
                                <CodeText val="non-diagnostic quality" />
